pageContext.claim: “I immediately deployed the National Guard and federal law enforcement to secure the building and expel the intruders. America is, and must always be, a nation of law and order.”
pageContext.analysis: All reporting indicates that Trump resisted requests for the National Guard, leaving it to Vice President Pence to act. Trump was said to be excited that the attack on the Capitol had halted the count of the votes cast in the Electoral College.
